onboardingTitle: You have not yet created a subnet
onboardingDescription: To create an endpoint, you must first create a subnet.
betaSubnetLimitMessage: You can only create one subnet per vRack Service at this time.
subnetCreationError: An error has occurred creating the subnet: {{error}}
serviceRangeAdditionalText: The service address range will be used by vRack Services. Therefore, the addresses in this range should not be used by other nodes connected to the vRack. The service address range must be a subset of the subnet address range, and its size must be between /27 and /29.
vlanAdditionalText: You can expose this subnet to a specific VLAN.
emptyDataGridMessage: You do not currently have any subnets
updateError: An error occurred while updating your subnet: {{error}}
modalDeleteInputLabel: Please enter the word “TERMINATE” to confirm the deletion of your subnet.
modalDeleteDescription: In order to be deleted, a subnet must not contain a linked Service Endpoint.
subnetsOnboardingTitle: You have not yet created a subnet
subnetsOnboardingDescription: To create an endpoint, you must first create a subnet.
subnetsEmptyDataGridMessage: You do not currently have any subnets
modalDeleteSubnetInputLabel: Please enter the word “TERMINATE” to confirm the deletion of your subnet.
modalDeleteSubnetDescription: In order to be deleted, a subnet must not contain a linked Service Endpoint.
modalSubnetUpdateDescription: You can change the subnet name, address range size, and service address range.
subnetCreationSuccess: Your subnet has been configured on the {{id}} vRack Services.
subnetUpdateSuccess: Your subnet on the vRack Services {{id}} has been modified.
subnetDeleteSuccess: Your subnet {{cidr}} has been deleted from the {{id}} vRack Services.
subnetUpdateError: An error has occurred updating your subnet: {{error}}.
subnetRangeAdditionalText: The subnet address range must be /24.
